<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1106871_financ_0.Assigned To field value</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>Assigned To field value</name><script><![CDATA[var assignedToList = Class.create();


assignedToList.prototype = {


initialize: function() {


},


AssignTo:function() {


var user = [];


var grp = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');


grp.addQuery('group', current.assignment_group);


grp.query();


while(grp.next())


user.push(grp.user.toString());


return 'sys_idIN' + user;


},

type: 'assignedToList'
};

]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-04 16:49:45</sys_created_on><sys_id>2170e2d947a7f1101c89dffe046d4317</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Assigned To field value</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Finance Service Management" source="x_1106871_financ_0">aba95e8c471e31101c89dffe046d437d</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Finance Service Management">aba95e8c471e31101c89dffe046d437d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2170e2d947a7f1101c89dffe046d4317</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-04 16:49:45</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
